title: Ep. 84 - Two Gurus Are Buying Stocks Right Now
itunes:title: Two Gurus Are Buying Stocks Right Now
description: Stephanie Link, Director of Research at TheStreet.com, sees a repeat of last summer's sell-off. Lou Basenese, founder of The White Cap Research Group, talks about small-caps and where he sees value in today’s market.
content:encoded: Stephanie Link, Director of Research at TheStreet.com, sees a repeat of last summer's sell-off. Lou Basenese, founder of The White Cap Research Group, talks about small-caps and where he sees value in today’s market.
